options.option_text: Yes, because there is a reduction from EXACT-COVER-BY-3-SETS to EXACT-COVER-BY-4-SETS.
Yes, because there is a reduction from EXACT-COVER-BY-4-SETS to EXACT-COVER-BY-3-SETS.
EXACT-COVER-BY-4-SETS may or may not be NP-Complete.

questions.question_text_1: Say problem X reduces to problem Y. Which of the following can we infer?
question_texts: Say problem X reduces to problem Y. Which of the following can we infer?

options.option_text: If X can be solved in polynomial time, then so can Y.
X can be solved in polynomial time if and only if Y can be solved in polynomialtime.
If X cannot be solved in polynomial time, then neither can Y.
If Y cannot be solved in polynomial time, then neither can X.
